mapper.insert: insert into gallery (title, userid, contents, fnames, fsizes, uuid) values (#{title}, #{userid}, #{contents}, #{fnames}, #{fsizes}, #{uuid})
mapper.select: select gno, title, userid, fnames, uuid, regdate, thumbup, views from gallery order by gno desc limit #{snum}, 24
select AUTO_INCREMENT-1 gno from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_NAME = 'gallery'
select fnames from gallery where gno = #{gno}
select fsizes from gallery where gno = #{gno}
